Message:
I’m sorry.
I’m sure there were probably
plenty of better ways to
call you back then.

But...those words just sort of
rolled off my tongue.

I’ve still got a lot
to learn...but someday,

I swear I’ll become
a magnificent witch
just like my master was.

And then, hopefully...
I’ll be able to protect
you and your loved ones
from anything.

...You give me the
confidence to believe
that I can achieve this.

If you’re okay with
someone like me,
I hope you’ll let me
always stay by your side,
